title: Bring-A-Trailer.com's Randy Nonnenberg
description:
Randy Nonnenberg is the founder of BringaTrailer, one of the best places to find interesting cars to buy, and one of the most addicting websites for a car fan. Matt stopped by BaT headquarters in SF to talk about the used car market. 

http://www.bringatrailer.com

 

This podcast is a video too! https://youtu.be/Mj9z2y5rnGM
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
